DOC.brief_summary: Three hundred healthy individual participant study . Participants evaluate follow assessment tool : Demographic data ; age , gender , height , body mass , record . Gait parameter ( step length , variation step length ) evaluate Gait trainer Biodex 2 , participant 's preferred speed .
DOC.detailed_description: Three hundred healthy individual participant study . Participants evaluate follow assessment tool : Demographic data ; age , gender , height , body mass , year , side level limb loss record . Gait parameter ( step length , variation step length ) evaluate Gait Trainer Biodex 2 , participant 's preferred speed . To eliminate learning effect , participant practice treadmill determine appropriate gait speed . Once participant imply preferred speed , ask walk self select speed 6 minute . Data record 4nd 6th minute walk .
DOC.criteria: Want participate Have passive joint limitation extremity Surgery last 5 year Systemic problem neurologic disorder , rheumatoid disordersâ€¦ Another orthopedic anomaly
